entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom.

entries.name: Age
entries: Bestari typically live up to 30 years and are considered Mature at age 5.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (4 - 7 feet tall).

entries.name: Claws.
entries: Your sharp claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength or Dexterity modifier, instead of the normal unarmed strike damage.

entries.name: Primal Agility.
entries: Before you move, as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir} you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

entries.name: Longstrider's Stamina.
entries: When you take the {@action Dash|Ishiir} action or use your Primal Agility trait, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Pack Hunter.
entries: When an ally who is not {@condition Incapacitated|Ishiir} is within 5 feet of your attack target, you can gain {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on attack rolls gainst that creature until the end of turn. You may do so a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} bonus. You regain one expended use upon completing a {@variantrule Short Rest|Ishiir}, and all expended uses upon completing a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Predator's Prowess.
entries: Select either the {@skill Athletics} or {@skill Stealth} skill. You have {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in the chosen skill. If you later gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in that skill from one of your class or background features, you instead gain Expertise.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Constitution, Charisma.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dragonborn typically live for up to 200 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (5-7 feet tall).

entries.name: Draconic Ancestry.
entries: Choose the colour of your Dragonborn. Your choice affects your Breath Weapon trait and you have {@variantrule Resistance|Ishiir} to the damage type determined by your Draconic Ancestry trait.

entries.name: Breath Weapon.
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|Ishiir} action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of magical energy in either a 15-foot Cone or a 30-foot Line that is 5 feet wide.

Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} (DC 8 plus your chosen modifier and {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus). On a failed save, a creature takes 1d10 damage of the type determined by your Draconic Ancestry trait. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. This damage increases by 1d10 when you reach character levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).

You can use this Breath Weapon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma is your ability modifier for your breath weapon, chosen when selecting this species.

entries.name: Darkvision.
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Draconic Flight.
entries: When you reach character level 5, you can channel draconic magic to give yourself temporary flight. As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir}, you sprout spectral wings on your back that last for 10 minutes or until you retract the wings (no action required) or have the {@condition Incapacitated|Ishiir} condition. During that time, you have a {@variantrule Fly Speed|Ishiir} equal to your {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir}. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Draconic and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Constitution, Wisdom.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dwarves typically live for up to 400 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (4-5 feet tall).

entries.name: Darkvision.
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience.
entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|Ishiir} to Poison damage. You also have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} you make to avoid or end the {@condition Poisoned|Ishiir} condition.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness.
entries: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

entries.name: Tool Expertise.
entries: Select one artisan's tool. You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in the selected tool. If you later gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in that tool from one of your class or background features, you instead gain Expertise.

entries.name: Dwarven Combat Training.
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} with 2 simple or martial weapons of your choice. In addition you also gain Light and Medium Armour {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Dwarvish and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Gnomes typically live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Small (3-4 feet tall.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} against spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gnomish.

entries.name: Illusionist.
entries: You know the {@spell Minor Illusion|Ishiir} cantrip. Your spellcasting ability for it is INT, WIS, or CHA.

entries.name: Forest Camouflage.
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in natural terrain.

entries.name: Forest Consultation.
entries: You always have the {@spell Speak with Animals|Ishiir} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}. You can also use any spell slots you have to cast the spell.

entries.name: Crafter.
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in one tool of your choice.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage.
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Tinkerer.
entries: You know the {@spell Mending|Ishiir} and {@spell Prestidigitation|Ishiir} cantrips.

In addition, you can spend 10 minutes to create a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5,1 HP), such as a toy, fire starter, or music box. When you create the device, you determine its function by choosing one effect from the {@spell Prestidigitation|Ishiir} cantrip; the device produces that effect whenever you or another creature takes a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir} to activate it with a touch.

If the chosen effect has options within it, you choose one of those options for the device when you create it. For example, if you choose the spell's ignite-extinguish effect, you determine whether the device ignites or extinguishes fire; the device doesn't do both. You can have three such devices in existence at a time, and each falls apart 8 hours after its creation or when you dismantle it with a touch as a Utilize action.
